Room.Name: Outside of the mausoleum
Room.Description: The skies seem eternally dark and cloudy here, and the stench of death is almost overpowering as you stand north of the huge grey stone building. There are numerous heavy footprints in the dirt leading into and out of this accursed place, along with many deep grooves as if something heavy has been dragged inside. You hear a faint howling from within, and sense an occassional rustling in the graveyard surrounding you. Suddenly, it dawns on you that entering here may be a very bad idea... A sign is posted, urging caution.

ExtraDescription.Description: This area is for high level characters only... 25 to 50+, and most everything is aggressive, so keep in large groups of high levels. Once you go in, there may be no coming back alive... you have been warned. - Written by Khargqwzxdds - Idea by Khargqwzxdds, Ulric, and Harrap Jan-1995

Room.Name: A grisly scene, NW corner of Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Half-decayed corpses have been dragged here and half-eaten by something with a ravenous appetite. Maybe it would be a good idea to find the way back outside now... A door leads back out to the south.

Room.Name: Foyer of the mausoleum.
Room.Description: You are in the entrance hall of the accursed mausoleum. Rats and roaches scuttle about here, feeding on decaying flesh. You hear the door shut behind you and realize that you have indeed made a mistake. To the north is the entryway back to the graveyard, to the south is the main area of the mausoleum. Corpses litter the ground, obviously being dragged here for some vile purpose. You have an urge to leave this place now.

Room.Name: A grisly scene, NE corner of Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Half-decayed corpses have been dragged here and half-eaten by something with a ravenous appetite. Maybe it would be a good idea to find the way back outside now... A door to the south leaves this carnage.

Room.Name: A small room.
Room.Description: This room is being used as a temporary storehouse for the corpses, until they can be dragged into the room to the south for some obviously horrible process to create the zombies you see roaming around here. To the south is a black wooden doorway, and to the east you may go back out to the main mausoleum area.

Room.Name: Northwest main area of the Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Zombies wander aimlessly around here. Most are oblivious to you, and go about their business of hauling corpses from one area to another, but a few of the unoccupied ones seem to have taken an interest in your life. There are doors to the north and west, and the mausoleum extends to the east and south.

Room.Name: Northern main area of the Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Zombies wander aimlessly around here. Most are oblivious to you, and go about their business of hauling corpses from one area to another, but a few of the unoccupied ones seem to have taken an interest in your life. There is a door to the north, and the mausoleum extends to the west, east, and south.

Room.Name: Northeastern main area of the Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Zombies wander aimlessly around here. Most are oblivious to you, and go about their business of hauling corpses from one area to another, but a few of the unoccupied ones seem to have taken an interest in your life. There is a door to the north and east, and the mausoleum extends to the west and south.

Room.Name: A small room.
Room.Description: This room is being used as a temporary storehouse for the corpses, until they can be dragged into the room to the south for some obviously horrible process to create the zombies you see roaming around here. To the south is a black wooden doorway, and to the west you may go back out to the main mausoleum area.

Room.Name: Western main area of the Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Zombies wander aimlessly around here. Most are oblivious to you, and go about their business of hauling corpses from one area to another, but a few of the unoccupied ones seem to have taken an interest in your life. There is a wall to the west, and the mausoleum extends to the north, east, and south.

Room.Name: Central main area of the Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Zombies wander aimlessly around here. Most are oblivious to you, and go about their business of hauling corpses from one area to another, but a few of the unoccupied ones seem to have taken an interest in your life. The mausoleum extends to the west, east, north and south.

Room.Name: Eastern main area of the Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Zombies wander aimlessly around here. Most are oblivious to you, and go about their business of hauling corpses from one area to another, but a few of the unoccupied ones seem to have taken an interest in your life. There is a wall to the east, and the mausoleum extends to the north, west, and south.

Room.Name: The workroom of Shadar Lunn
Room.Description: The room is very orderly and neat, except for a pile of gore and body parts against the far wall. Weapons are displayed neatly in cases, and a suit of armor lies ready to be donned at a moment's notice. The occupant is obviously a very organized, however twisted, individual.

Room.Name: The dark priest's coffin room.
Room.Description: This room has several black candles burning, and a small shrine to the god of Chaotic Evil, Loki. There is not much more worth noticing, besides the rancid odor coming from the opened crypts nearby.

Room.Name: The dark priest's workroom.
Room.Description: There is obviously an unholy resident that works in this room, judging by the evil and accursed relics strewn about.

Room.Name: Western check point.
Room.Description: A pile of bodies lies by the doorway here, while burdened zombies dump more corpses slowly in with the rest. To the west appears to be some sort of important room in the building.

Room.Name: Central main area of the Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Zombies wander aimlessly around here. Most are oblivious to you, and go about their business of hauling corpses from one area to another, but a few of the unoccupied ones seem to have taken an interest in your life. The mausoleum extends to the west, east, north and south.

Room.Name: Eastern check point.
Room.Description: A pile of bodies lies by the doorway here, while burdened zombies dump more corpses slowly in with the rest. To the east appears to be some sort of important room in the building.

Room.Name: A vacant workroom.
Room.Description: This crypt area is seemingly undisturbed by the undead pillagers roaming around outside. Maybe this would be a good place to rest.

Room.Name: The Rakshaka's workspace.
Room.Description: This room has several jungle-type plants in pots against the far wall, giving it a bit of scenery, despite the unspeakable things that have taken place to the dead bodies which lie piled up in the corner.

Room.Name: Western main area of the Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Zombies wander aimlessly around here. Most are oblivious to you, and go about their business of hauling corpses from one area to another, but a few of the unoccupied ones seem to have taken an interest in your life. There is a wall to the west, and the mausoleum extends to the north, east, and south.

Room.Name: Central main area of the Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Zombies wander aimlessly around here. Most are oblivious to you, and go about their business of hauling corpses from one area to another, but a few of the unoccupied ones seem to have taken an interest in your life. The mausoleum extends to the west, east, north and south.

Room.Name: Eastern main area of the Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Zombies wander aimlessly around here. Most are oblivious to you, and go about their business of hauling corpses from one area to another, but a few of the unoccupied ones seem to have taken an interest in your life. There is a wall to the east, and the mausoleum extends to the north, west, and south.

Room.Name: Roaming ground for the Demon.
Room.Description: A small demon has taken up residence in this room, and is hard at work in raising a small force of undead troops to please it's master.

Room.Name: A small room.
Room.Description: This room is being used as a temporary storehouse for the corpses, until they can be dragged into the room to the north for some obviously horrible process to create the zombies you see roaming around here. To the north is a black wooden doorway, and to the east you may go back out to the main mausoleum area.

Room.Name: Southwest main area of the Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Zombies wander aimlessly around here. Most are oblivious to you, and go about their business of hauling corpses from one area to another, but a few of the unoccupied ones seem to have taken an interest in your life. There are doors to the south and west, and the mausoleum extends to the east and north.

Room.Name: Central main area of the Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Zombies wander aimlessly around here. Most are oblivious to you, and go about their business of hauling corpses from one area to another, but a few of the unoccupied ones seem to have taken an interest in your life. The mausoleum extends to the west, east, north and south.

Room.Name: Southeast main area of the Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Zombies wander aimlessly around here. Most are oblivious to you, and go about their business of hauling corpses from one area to another, but a few of the unoccupied ones seem to have taken an interest in your life. There are doors to the south and east, and the mausoleum extends to the west and north.

Room.Name: A small room.
Room.Description: This room is being used as a temporary storehouse for the corpses, until they can be dragged into the room to them to them to theobviously horrible process to create the zombies you see roaming around here. To the north is a black wooden doorway, and to the west you may go back out to the main mausoleum area.

Room.Name: A grisly scene, SW corner of Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Half-decayed corpses have been dragged here and half-eaten by something with a ravenous appetite. Maybe it would be a good idea to find the way back outside now... A door leads back out to the nouth.

Room.Name: A hole in the southern wall.
Room.Description: A large hole has been smashed into the south end of the Mausoleum's wall, to allow something easier access in and out asiehe complex. To the south, a large crater is vaguely visible through the patches of fog and smoke.

Room.Name: A grisly scene, SE corner of Mausoleum.
Room.Description: Half-decayed corpses have been dragged here and half-eaten by something with a ravenous appetite. Maybe it would be a good idea to find the way back outside now... A door leads back out to the nouth.

Room.Name: A Rakshaka's lair.
Room.Description: The Rakshaka that has taken up residence in this crypt leaves little by way of personal belongings around. A few polished skulls, a couple of silver chains, and perhaps a coin or two from a country you have never heard of.

Room.Name: A burnt room.
Room.Description: The walls of this crypt chamber have been covered in ash and cinder, leading you to believe there has been a large fire recently. In the far corner of the room, 3 huddled, burnt corpses lie resting.

Room.Name: Approaching a Palatial Mausoleum
Room.Description: The narrow path is a winding trail that leads up to the palatial mausoleum, a grand structure of marble and stone that rises up from the island. On either side of the path, towering statues of regal figures stand watch, each one more grand and imposing than the last. The statues are carefully crafted, with lifelike details that bring the figures to life, and they are arrayed in formal poses that suggest the power and prestige of their subjects. The path itself is lined with pristine white stones, and it winds its way through a lush jungle of exotic plants and towering trees. The air is thick with the fragrant scents of blooming flowers and the chirping of tropical birds, and the sounds of the ocean can be heard in the distance. The closer one gets to the mausoleum, the more imposing and majestic it becomes, a testament to the wealth and power of whoever lies within. The island itself is a peaceful and serene place, with the only sounds being the gentle rustling of the leaves and the occasional call of a bird. The path, the statues, and the mausoleum all work together to create an atmosphere of hushed reverence.

Room.Name: The Path of Immortal Kings
Room.Description: The narrow path is a winding trail that leads up to the palatial mausoleum, a grand structure of marble and stone that rises up from the island. On either side of the path, towering statues of regal figures stand watch, each one more grand and imposing than the last. The statues are carefully crafted, with lifelike details that bring the figures to life, and they are arrayed in formal poses that suggest the power and prestige of their subjects. The path itself is lined with pristine white stones, and it winds its way through a lush jungle of exotic plants and towering trees. The air is thick with the fragrant scents of blooming flowers and the chirping of tropical birds, and the sounds of the ocean can be heard in the distance. The closer one gets to the mausoleum, the more imposing and majestic it becomes, a testament to the wealth and power of whoever lies within. The island itself is a peaceful and serene place, with the only sounds being the gentle rustling of the leaves and the occasional call of a bird. The path, the statues, and the mausoleum all work together to create an atmosphere of hushed reverence.

Room.Name: On a Beach
Room.Description: The rocky beach is a place of rough beauty, where the relentless power of the ocean is on full display. The sand is rough and gritty, dotted with pebbles and larger stones that have been smoothed and shaped by the endless pounding of the waves. The waves themselves are a constant, rolling roar, breaking against the rocks and sending plumes of salt spray into the air. The cliffs rise up on either side of the beach, providing a dramatic backdrop to the scene. These cliffs are jagged and pocked with crags and caves, and they provide a home for seabirds that wheel and call overhead.

NPC.name: zombie disgusting rotting
NPC.description: You can't tell if this was once a man or a woman, or even what race it once was.... Just that it is horribly decayed, and appears to be missing a few chunks of flesh, like something else had been eating off of it. The zombie seems oblivious to you, until you draw close enough for it to make its kill.
NPC.longDescription: A horribly disgusting zombie is here, looking to devour the living.

NPC.name: zombie
NPC.description: This greyish skinned creature was once probably a powerful adventurer, such as yourself, before it was slain and reanimated for some dark and powerful creature. Upon closer examination, you notice that the thing before you actually has no eyes, but instead a faint red glow eminates from it's eye sockets.
NPC.longDescription: A pale, withered man stands here, staring at you with an immense hatred.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Wimpy Undead
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared DarkVision DetectIllusion PassDoor

NPC.name: young vampire
NPC.description: This young lady looks quite famished and pale.
NPC.longDescription: A young vampire stands here, looking for something to kill.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared PassDoor DarkVision DetectIllusion

NPC.name: Kharzandra wizardress vampire
NPC.description: Fear grips you upon looking at this frail, young looking creature, when you realize what it truly is... a Dark-elf enchantress which has become a creature of the undead. She looks a bit hungry after having a full day of reanimating corpses, perhaps you will be her dinner?
NPC.longDescription: A dark-skinned wizardress stands here, raising the dead.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Sneak PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: vampire shadar lunn
NPC.description: This large man is clad in high darkened armor, and was probably once a lieutenant in the Arkham guard... or else, he just knows good armor when he sees it.
NPC.longDescription: A large, stout man stands here clad in darkened armor.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared PassDoor DarkVision DetectIllusion

NPC.name: ghoul creature
NPC.description: This disgusting, withered humanoid creature greedily devours a decayed corpse in earnest, but drops it upon noticing the fresh meat that just walked into the room.
NPC.longDescription: A horrible creature is here, feeding off of a decaying corpse.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared Flying DetectIllusion PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: mastiff hound
NPC.longDescription: A large mastiff stands here guarding something.
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Sneak Hide DarkVision DetectIllusion

NPC.name: bat vampire
NPC.description: A horrible little face looks at you and bares its teeth. Ugh! You don't like it.
NPC.longDescription: A pitch-black bat flaps its wings beneath the ceiling.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectHidden Infrared Sneak Flying Regeneration DetectIllusion

NPC.name: demon familiar
NPC.description: This little guy looks very familar... you know it would be a bad thing to mess with it.
NPC.longDescription: A small demon is here, hovering in mid-air.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared PassDoor DarkVision DetectIllusion

NPC.name: dracolich
NPC.description: Horrible skeletal form look at you and green evilly.
NPC.longDescription: A huge skeletal form raises from shadows.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DarkVision DetectIllusion Flying PassDoor

NPC.name: priest vampire
NPC.description: This dark-priest wears the sign of Loki about his neck, and is seeming disturbed by your intrusion during his meditation.
NPC.longDescription: A dark-robed man stands here, praying to his unholy god.

NPC.name: dark spectre
NPC.description: You can see right through this creature, except for the dark patch surrounding it's red, glowing eyes... it looks pissed off that you're still alive.
NPC.longDescription: A dark spectre is here, feeding off your lifeforce.
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Hide Flying PassDoor DetectIllusion

Item.Name: key black
Item.LongDescription: An ordinary skeleton key lies here.

Item.Name: frostbrand sword
Item.LongDescription: An ice-cold broad sword lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Magic NoDrop Bless Flaming Frost Vorpal TwoHands

Item.Name: symbol unholy lloth
Item.LongDescription: A forboding symbol of evil lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Dark Evil Magic Bless AntiGood AntiNeutral

Item.Name: corpse
Item.LongDescription: A decaying corpse lies here, feeding the worms and rats.

Item.Name: darkened boots
Item.LongDescription: A pair of darkened boots lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Dark Evil Magic AntiGood

Item.Name: darkened helm helmet
Item.LongDescription: A darkened helmet lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Dark Evil Bless AntiGood

Item.Name: darkened leggings
Item.LongDescription: A pair of darkened leggings is lying here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Dark Evil Bless AntiGood

ExtraDescription.Description: Upon closer examination of these leggings, you realize they are of extraordinary craftsmanship, and are very light for their huge size. Only a great warrior may wear them with little fear of death.

Item.Name: arkham signet ring
Item.LongDescription: A small, iron ring lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Dark Evil Magic Bless AntiGood

Item.Name: darkened shield
Item.LongDescription: A darkened shield is propped up against the wall here.

Item.Name: guardian sword
Item.LongDescription: A guardian sword lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Dark Evil Magic Bless AntiGood NoRemove Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

Item.Name: potion healing
Item.LongDescription: A crystal-clear potion lies here... it looks refreshing.

Item.Name: staff wrath
Item.LongDescription: A long, golden staff is here

Item.Name: cloak death
Item.LongDescription: A pile of blackened cloth is here.

Item.Name: scroll yellow parchment
Item.LongDescription: A yellow from age, almost decayed parchment lies here.

Item.Name: copper ring fortitide
Item.LongDescription: A small copper ring lays here, shining with a dull gleam.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Dark Evil Invisibility Magic NoDrop Bless NoRemove

ExtraDescription.Description: An inscription is engraved inside the ring, stating 'accursed be the one not worthy of the true powers you behold'...

Item.Name: corpse
Item.ShortDescription: a corpse of an elfin wizard
Item.LongDescription: A freshly killed corpse lies here, waiting to be buried.

Item.Name: flail pestilance
Item.LongDescription: A worm-infested ball and chain lie here.

Item.Name: poncho
Item.LongDescription: A pile of filthy rags lies here.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.LongDescription: A horribly mutilated, yet still fairly fresh corpse lies here.

Item.Name: emerald potion
Item.LongDescription: An emerald colored potion is here.

Item.Name: corpse
Item.LongDescription: This corpse appears to have been left alone by the ravaging undead here.

Item.Name: ulrician belt
Item.LongDescription: A amber-tainted belt lies coiled up here.

Item.Name: shadow dagger litrahth
Item.LongDescription: A black, glinting blade lies here waiting to be picked up.

ExtraDescription.Description: Wear the dagger and speak the magic words, 'Litrahth Ezandor' to open the portal to the spirit realms...

Item.Name: shadow dagger
Item.LongDescription: A black, glinting blade lies here waiting to be picked up.

ExtraDescription.Description: Wear the dagger and speak the magic words, 'Litrahth Ezandor' to open the portal to the spirit realms...

Item.Name: claw dracolich
Item.LongDescription: A claw of great ancient Dracolich is here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Dark Evil Magic NoDrop Bless NoRemove Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison

Item.Name: coffin
Item.LongDescription: A plain, wooden coffin is here.

Item.Name: sceptre chaos
Item.LongDescription: A flaming rod of steel lies here.

Item.Name: libram gainful conjuration
Item.LongDescription: A large spellbook lies here waiting to be read.

Item.Name: potion protection divine
Item.LongDescription: A gleamy, white potion is here.

Item.Name: cloak wizardry
Item.LongDescription: A mystical, maroon cloak lies here in a pile.

Item.Name: scroll overkill
Item.LongDescription: A scroll with the title 'Ultimate Overkill' lies here.

Item.Name: scroll truimph
Item.LongDescription: A scroll with the title 'Truimph' lies here.

Item.Name: scroll feasting
Item.LongDescription: A scroll with the title 'Feasting' lies here.

Item.Name: scroll redecoration
Item.LongDescription: A scroll with the title 'Room-redecoration' lies here.

Item.Name: scroll protection
Item.LongDescription: A scroll with the title 'Protection' lies here.

Item.Name: scroll invulnerability
Item.LongDescription: A scroll with the title 'Invulnerability' lies here.

Item.Name: scroll wolverine
Item.LongDescription: A scroll with the title 'Wolverine' lies here.

Item.Name: scroll lifebane
Item.LongDescription: A scroll with the title 'Lifebane' lies here.

Item.Name: scroll destruction
Item.LongDescription: A scroll with the title 'Destruction' lies here.

Item.Name: scroll chaos
Item.LongDescription: A scroll with the title 'Chaos' lies here.

Item.Name: potion healing bvumpertan
Item.LongDescription: A crystal-clear potion lies here... it looks refreshing.

Item.Name: potion life
Item.LongDescription: A reddish-brown potion lies here.

Item.Name: darkened platemail plate
Item.LongDescription: A darkened platemail lies here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Dark Evil Magic AntiGood
